CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1959, page A10 reads: "The Lavedettes - Members of the LaVedettes take it easy at a recent gathering. They sponsored their first affair April 26. They featured a mother and daughter fashion show and tea at the Greene Hearth. From left to right, standing: Gloria Morgan, Beverly Wall, Jackie Bagley, Diane Dixon, Judy Brooks, Beverly Malone, Gwendolyn Morris. Seated: Barbara Williams, Loretta Malone, and Loretta Malone. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of ten women from the Lavedettes, including standing from left to right, Gloria Morgan, Beverly Wall, Jackie Bagley, Diane Dixon, Judy Brooks, Beverly Malone, Gwendolyn Morris, seated from left to right, Barbara Williams, Loretta Malone, and Loretta Malone, gathered around television in living room interior with light colored curtains, fireplace and mirror
